title: Ace Ventura Pc Game - 7th Level (English)
description:
Classic Adventure, point-and-click PC-Game

7TH Level - Ace Ventura: The Pet Detective (1996)


" 
The series of movies featuring Jim Carrey as a bumbling pet detective is now a hilarious game for your PC. Travel to more than 60 different areas from the Alaskan Tundra to a Bavarian Castle solving puzzles along your misguided journey. There are plenty of animal haters out there to make your efforts all the more difficult, but high-tech gadgetry, cool vehicles, and your own wits will help get the furry critters home safely. There are plenty of clues out there, but are you smart enough to find any of them?                                                              
                                                                                 "


1. Mount cd-image (iso-file) (Daemon Tools)
2. Install the game
3. (for Widows XP and higher) Explore your installation-folder, right-click 
   on Ace.exe -> properties -> compatibility -> set modus to Windows 95,    
   256 clors and resolution 640x480
4. Run the game. Have fun!

                                                                                  
Minimum Requirements:

  33MHz Processor
  8MB RAM
  8MB HDD Space
